translations: v．玷污，诽谤：弄脏或损害某人或某物的名声。
· His reputation was besmirched by the scandal.

sentences.sentence: His body was bruised, his hands were bleeding, and his rags were all besmirched with mud.
sentences.translation: 他身上青一块紫一块的，手上流着血，破衣服上全是污泥。
心灵已经变得非常肮脏。

sentences.sentence: She feels his behavior has besmirched his family name.
sentences.translation: 她觉得他的行为损害了他的家庭名声。
